movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plotSummary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plotSummary: Interwoven stories of crime, redemption, and the search for a mysterious briefcase.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plotSummary: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind with a dark sense of humor.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plotSummary: The life story of a man with low intelligence who witnesses and unwittingly influences historical events.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plotSummary: A thief enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plotSummary: The patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.plotSummary: A young hobbit, Frodo, must destroy a powerful ring to save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.plotSummary: A farm boy, a princess, and a smuggler join the Rebel Alliance to defeat the evil Galactic Empire.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
